channel.title: maven on Mike's ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in maven on Mike's ramblings

item.title: Adding tags to docker-maven-plugin
item.description: Adding a latest tag to docker containers built by docker-maven-plugin <name>${project.artifactId}:${project.version}</name> <build> <tags combine.children="append"> <tag>latest</tag> </tags> <from>${base.docker.image}</from>
